text:
[Verse]
Golden hues paint the sky
Endless day fades away
Soft whispers in the air
Moments here hearts lay bare

[Verse 2]
Twilight calls stars arise
Moonlight gaze in your eyes
Gentle breeze through the trees
In this moment we’re at ease

[Chorus]
Sunset dream forever flows
In the night our love glows
Holding on until the light
Dreaming softly through the night

[Verse 3]
Silent waves kiss the shore
Our hearts asking for more
Time stands still in this scene
Lost in our sunset dream

[Verse 4]
Colors fade shadows blend
Night and day together mend
Stars above guide our way
Chasing dreams till break of day

[Bridge]
Set adrift on golden seas
Heartbeats sync with ocean breeze
In this space love’s serene
Captured in our sunset dream
title: Sunset Dream
